statements: UPDATE user_reviews SET rating = 5 WHERE brand_name = 'Apple' AND model_name = 'iPhone X';

UPDATE user_reviews SET rating = 4, model_name = 'New Model' WHERE review_id = 100;

UPDATE bicycle_brands SET founding_year = 1900, website = 'www.updatedwebsite.com' WHERE brand_name = 'Trek';
